overview: When Daniel decides it's time to move on, naturally Jacob follows suit - against his better judgment. They both decide to break their big news to their respective families - the reactions of which are not only different but life-changing. Daniel can't believe his luck - his family is tight knit and understand one another. Additionally, his mum Dorothy quickly finds an appropriate way of breaking the news to her close network of friends. For Jacob however, it's a different story.
title: Total Reaction
